attributes.action: allow Mossley Football Club to move ahead unfettered by petty rivalries, poor management and other "stuff"...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mossley Football Club is in trouble - staring relegation in the face - trouble between fans and players - and a ruling dynasty who, despite the fact that we know they'e leaving, refuse to publicly come out.  We the fans demand immediate action to safeguard this 100+ year old football club. A new sponsor/"sugar daddy" would be great !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
